title: Verifiable Credential Basic Schema
description: The Credential Schema is a document that is used to guarantee the structure of Verifiable Credential.

@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Verifiable Credential

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Credential Exemple : did:exemple:abcdefghi;id=17de181feb67447da4e78259d92d0240;version=1.0

issuer.description: Defines the issuer of the Verifiable Credential

issuanceDate.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Credential becomes valid

expirationDate.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Credential expires

credentialSubject.description: Defines information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Credential

id.description: Defines the DID of the subject that is described by the Verifiable Credential

credentialStatus.description: Contains information about how to verify the status of the Verifiable Attestation (via the Revocation and Endorsement Registry, RER)

id.description: References record in the Revocation and Endorsement Registry (RER) to enable verification of a Verifiable Attestationâ€™s validity

type.description: (the object could contain a link to an external document noting whether or not the credential is suspended or revoked.) Defines the Verifiable Credential status type

credentialSchema.description: (to check credential schema compatibility) Contains information about the credential schema (template) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based

id.description: References the credential schema (template) stored on the (relevant) Schemas Registry (SR) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based

evidence.description: Contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the Verifiable Attestation ( For example, an issuer could check physical documentation provided by the subject or perform a set of background checks before issuing the credential.)

id.description: If present, it MUST contain a URL that points to where more information about this instance of evidence can be found.

verifier.description: Defines entity which has verified documents before Verifiable Attestation issuance

evidenceDocument.description: Defines document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Attestation issuance

subjectPresence.description: Defines if the Verifiable Attestation subject was physically present in the course of the verification

documentPresence.description: Defines how the document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Attestation issuance have been provided (e.g. physically, digitally)

proofPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the proof

created.description: Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

verificationMethod.description: Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

proofValue.description: Defines the proof value in JWS format
